title: Ride Free Fearless Money: I’m not Broke, Now What?!
desc: Ride Free: Fearless Money: ?I?m not Broke, Now What? ! ?is a 3 hour class geared towards people who have income [of some sort, doesn?t need to be alot or 9-5] and who are interested in saving and strategizing with their income in a space?that holds intersectional values at its core. We explain and introduce best practices around: ? self-care and emotional health around our relationship to money ? budgeting, saving, accruing ? at any income level ? credit: what it is, credit reports, how to deal with errors on your credit report, how to fix your credit ? business! freelancer tips for maximizing your side job[s] ? taxes: writeoffs, schedule Cs, when to TTAA* [*talk to an accountant], lawyer, or an CFP ? investing: retirement, mutual funds, stocks - when, why, where and how to do it aligned with your values You?ll leave the class with: ? an action plan to work on your financial health ? resources to use ? an ?accountabilibuddy? from class with whom to discuss and follow up on your plans [optional but helpful!] Cost: $40-$120 sliding scale. How do I know what to pick? It's based on your access to resources.? More on this sliding scale here. More info about this series: http://ridefreefearlessmoney.com
